issue.title: Relation management panel : cannot add children
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

When defining relation between parent ressource and child(ren), the button "Add child" is supposed to be visible when :
- current (parent) ressource is in state "in progress" or "validated"
or
- current user is ressource manager for the current (parent) ressource.

It's not the case.

There is a bug in the code testing the visibility of the button. Bug has been introduced with organism manager functionnality.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
